<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Kashrishi Revivification](/Feats.aspx?ID=3978) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kashrishi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=462" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 45</row>

**Frequency**
once pre day

**Trigger**
You have the [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) condition and are about to attempt a recovery check. You can use Kashrishi Revivification even if you're otherwise unable to act.

</column>

---

The well of psychic energy held within your mind can exceed the limitations of your physical body. You're restored to 1 Hit Point, lose the dying and [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) conditions, and can act normally on this turn. You gain or increase the [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) condition as normal for losing the dying condition.
name: Kashrishi Revivification
